attributes.action: UK Government to recognise Nowruz and include it in the official UK calendar.
attributes.additional_details:
We are urging the UK Government to recognize Nowruz, the iranian new year, as a culturally significant event and include it in the official UK calendar.

I believe that officially recognising Nowruz would be a meaningful step toward celebrating the cultural diversity that makes the UK a unique and vibrant society.
attributes.background: Formally recognition of Nowruz, the Iranian New Year, as a national cultural celebration in the United Kingdom, akin to how other cultural holidays such as Chinese New Year are officially acknowledged.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, there is no official UK calendar therefore this request is not possible. Decisions around the marking of specific cultural events are made by individual organisations.
